attributes.action: Stop any building compound work on the peel estate
attributes.additional_details: There is a compound being built on the peel estate. The bosses reckon everyone was informed by letters. Which noone on the estate got. They have started to build a compound and it is meant to cover the whole field. Thu are cutting our trees down. And thu said it is up a minimum of 3years. House value is dropping too. The petition is to STOP anyone from working on our estate and placing anything on it like they are
